_header: This feast is knowed among mankind
Note: For the South English Legendary version see 362 and 4258.
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; All Souls’ Day
_description: All Souls’ Day, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Þis fest es knawed o mang man kinde& cald of cristen sawles þe mynde…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þat lastes euer with outen endegod wis us to þat welth at wende
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 186.
